title: About Wild Sync
description1: Living in a busy modern society, we often overlook the precious resources of nature and the opportunities to connect with others. Wild Sync aims to bring people back to nature while building stronger community connections. Whether you want to participate in an activity or organize one, Wild Sync has you covered:
description2: Our platform offers a wide variety of outdoor activities. Whether you are an amateur enthusiast or an experienced explorer, you can find activities that suit you.
description3: You can easily find like-minded hiking partners on Wild Sync. You can create a profile, host your own activities, or join others' itineraries.
description4: Wild Sync emphasizes environmental philosophy. We encourage participants to follow Leave No Trace principles to ensure that activities do not cause damage to the natural environment. We hope to educate people on how to protect our planet through participation in outdoor activities.
